alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a pyrazole ring which bears a ketone.
alternative_parents.name: Pyrazolones

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a fatty acid moiety linked to an amine group through an ester linkage.
alternative_parents.name: N-acyl amines

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an amide derivative of carboxylic acid, with the general structure RN(R1)C(R2)=O (R1-R2 any atom but H).
alternative_parents.name: Tertiary carboxylic acid amides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an aromatic ring where a carbon atom is linked to an hetero atom.
alternative_parents.name: Heteroaromatic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds comprising a five-member nitrogen heterocyclic ring containing at least one other non-carbon atom of either nitrogen, sulfur, or oxygen.
alternative_parents.name: Azoles

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one oxygen atom linked to a ring carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Oxacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an N-Alkylidene derivative of hydrazine. They have the generic structure RNN=C(R')R\" (R,R',R\"= H or organyl group).
alternative_parents.name: Hydrazones

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the dialkyl ether functional group, with the formula ROR', where R and R' are alkyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Dialkyl ethers

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one nitrogen atom and one carbon atom linked to each other.
alternative_parents.name: Azacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic neutral compounds having formal unit electrical charges of opposite sign.
alternative_parents.name: Organic zwitterions

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a potassium ion.
alternative_parents.name: Organic potassium salts

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Compounds containing an oxazinane moiety, which consists of a saturated aliphatic six-member ring with one oxygen atom, a nitrogen atom, and four carbon atoms. Isomers  of oxaphospholane include 1,2-oxazinane, 1,3-oxazinane, and 1,4-oxazinane.
class.name: Oxazinanes

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as morpholine carboxylic acids and derivatives. These are heterocyclic compounds containing a morpholine ring substituted by one or more carboxylic acid groups (or derivative thereof).

direct_parent.description: Heterocyclic compounds containing a morpholine ring substituted by one or more carboxylic acid groups (or derivative thereof).
direct_parent.name: Morpholine carboxylic acids and derivatives

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a morpholine moiety, which consists of a six-member aliphatic saturated ring with the formula C4H9NO, where the oxygen and nitrogen atoms lie at positions 1 and 4, respectively.
subclass.name: Morpholines

superclass.description: Compounds containing a ring with least one carbon atom and one non-carbon atom.
superclass.name: Organoheterocyclic compounds
